fi.name: noveSezeni
fi.titl: Open company in a new window

fi.name: zalohaDB
fi.desc: Backup of data on local pc. Backups can be restored also to ABRA Flexi installation.

fi.name: penizePolDokl
fi.desc: Overview of all movements in the various lists of bank and cash modules. There are bank and cash desk items. Through standard filtering you create overviews of document items or you can search groups of movements according to set criteria, independently of documents in which the items originated.

fi.name: ucetnictviPolDokl
fi.desc: Overview of all movements in the various lists of internal receipts, other receivables and liabilities. There are items of already mentioned receipts. Through standard filtering you create overviews of receipt items of the documents or you can search groups of movements according to set criteria independently of receipts in which the items originated.

fi.name: nNastav
fi.desc: Basic company settings, company data, logo and stamp, legislative parameters and automated operations.

fi.name: ucDoklUcty
fi.desc: Update of chart of accounts and properties setting of standard balance sheet and profit and lost account.

fi.name: intDokl
fi.desc: Actualization and creation of internal accounting documents in set accounting period.

fi.name: intRady
fi.desc: Numerical rows setting for actualization of internal documents.

fi.name: intTyp
fi.desc: Internal document types enable to set basic parameters. Those are bringing to book, document series...

fi.name: adrDodavatel
fi.desc: Update of suppliers, contacts, events and supplier's bank accounts.

fi.name: adrOdberatel
fi.desc: Actualization of customers, contacts, events and bank accounts of customers.

fi.name: adrAdresar
fi.desc: Update of all addresses, contacts, bank accounts and events.

fi.name: adrKontakty
fi.desc: List of all contacts that you record by companies. In the list you can search for contact by entered criterions through all companies. In update form by each company you can see contacts linked to concrete address. In contact you can enter company, position or rank, phone no., e-mail, notes and selective keys for filing and searching the contact.

fi.name: adrUdalosti
fi.desc: List of all events which are conected with partner. Event can be also understood as negotiation record with partner or task which needs to be fulfilled to certain date. In address edit window you see list of events linked to selected partner. Well managed event list enables company's manger to task the emloyees and to monitor solutions status.

fi.name: adrRuUdalosti
fi.desc: List of all events from workflow

fi.name: adrTypAkt
fi.desc: Users setting of typical events or activities in your firm.

fi.name: adrTypNaklAkt
fi.desc: List of all types of costs associated with an activity or event. It includes a link to pricelist.

fi.name: adrMistUrc
fi.desc: List of all destinations.

fi.name: adrSmlAkt
fi.desc: List of all contracts

fi.name: adrSmlAktView
fi.desc: List of all contracts

fi.name: adrSmlDodavAkt
fi.desc: List of all supply contracts.

fi.name: adrSmlDodavAktView
fi.desc: List of all supply contracts.

fi.name: cenSku
fi.desc: Item and material groups enables to classify price list/catalogue to transparent groups, definition of bringing to book of these groups and also setting pricing for these groups.

fi.name: cenSkupCen
fi.desc: Price groups

fi.name: cenHlad
fi.desc: Price levels create link between item group and customer group and by it clearly defined pricing.

fi.name: cenAkt
fi.desc: Price list contains complete goods, material and service overview. Everything is classified into groups. You define goods placement in the stocks.

fi.name: cenOdberateleView
fi.titl: Prices for customers/customers groups, special codes

fi.name: sklKar
fi.desc: Stock cards are created in price list. You will create price list item and define goods or material placement in the stocks. Here you can find overviews of stock level and movements on cards including well-arranged reports.

fi.name: sklAkt
fi.desc: Stock cards creation and theirs update. Stock list contains basic parameters for documents posting.

fi.name: sklVyrCis
fi.desc: List of serial numbers

fi.name: sklVyrCisVyb
fi.desc: Selection of serial numbers

fi.name: sklVyrCisView
fi.desc: Overview of documents of serial numbers

fi.name: sklVyrCisHlavView
fi.desc: Overview of serial numbers

fi.name: sklMapSklad
fi.desc: This sets priorities of stocks use

fi.name: sklAktNovy
fi.titl: Make out a receipt card/withdrawal card

fi.name: sklPol
fi.desc: Summary of all stock movements. With help of standard filtration you can make stock items overviews or you can seek a groups of movements by entered criterions independently of stock cards or documents.

fi.name: sklPolPrehled
fi.desc: Summary of all stock movements. With help of standard filtration you can make stock items overviews or you can seek a groups of movements by entered criterions independently of stock cards or documents.

fi.name: stavSklWizard
fi.desc: An overview of the status of all items in the pricelist with their quantity on a particular stock to the specified date.

fi.name: sklRady
fi.desc: Document series setting for receipt/issue card update.

fi.name: favTyp
fi.desc: Invoices out types enables to set basic parameters. These are: bringing to book, payment method, document series...

fi.name: favAkt
fi.desc: Invoices out update in set accounting period. Invoicing from the stock automatically creates issue cards. Button "Services" enables print of current invoice, gives overal information about customer and creates cash settlement.

fi.name: favPol
fi.desc: Overall overview of all invoice items. With help of standard filtration you can create invoice items overviews or you can search item groups by entered criterions independently on documents. Usage exmaple: You want to see which companies you have invoiced for concrete goods during the last two months.

fi.name: favProdejky
fi.desc: Money box is designed for cash sale. It is the most simplified form of sales receipt. Once a day you upload sales to the cash desk, which is attached to the money box. Link is defined in the list of money boxes.

fi.name: favProdPlat
fi.desc: Payment of documents in cash register.

fi.name: polDoklPrehProdej
fi.desc: Overviews of all movements in single lists of sale module. Following items are concerned: issued invoices, received demands, issued offers and received orders. With help of standard filtration you can create items overviews of mentioned documents or you can search movement groups by entered criterions independently on documents in which the items were created.

fi.name: favRady
fi.desc: Document series setting for invoices out update.

fi.name: fapAkt
fi.desc: Invoices in update in set accounting period. Invoicing from the stock automatically creates receipt cards. Button "Services" enables print of current invoice, gives overal information about supplier and creates cash settlement.

fi.name: fapPol
fi.desc: Overal overview of all invoice items. With help of standard filtration you create invoice items overviews or you can look for item groups according to entered criterions independently of documents. Example of use: You want to see, which companies invoiced you for concrete goods during the two last moths.

fi.name: polDoklNakupProdej
fi.desc: Overviews of all movements in single lists of purchase module. Following items are concerned: received invoices, issued demands, received offers and issued orders. With help of standard filtration you can create items overviews of mentioned documents or you can search movement groups by entered criterions independently on documents in which the items were created.

fi.name: fapRady
fi.desc: Document series setting for invoices in update.

fi.name: phlTyp
fi.desc: #Types of other receivables enables to set basic parameters. Those are bringing to book, document series...

fi.name: phlAkt
fi.desc: Updates and creation of receivables in set accounting period, which aren't placed in outgoing invoices. For example payment a rent regulation at your premises.

fi.name: phlRady
fi.desc: Number series updates for receivables.

fi.name: zavTyp
fi.desc: Other liability types enables to set basic parameters. Those are posting document series...

fi.name: zavAkt
fi.desc: Updates and creation of obligations in set accounting period, which aren't placed in invoices in. For example leasing, rent etc.

fi.name: zavRady
fi.desc: Number series updates for obligations.

fi.name: banAkt
fi.desc: Bank statement items update in set accounting period. Button "Services" enables print of current document, match document with invoice, debt or obligation.

fi.name: banZapocty
fi.desc: Creation of reciprocal credit is possible through wizard, where you enter a firm you do a reciprocal credit with. Then you select credit documents for accounting. To create a credit you can also do document after document, similar to the creation of bank statements items.

fi.name: banDenik
fi.desc: This will execute calculation and bank book print

fi.name: banRady
fi.desc: Document series setting for bank statements update.

fi.name: pokAkt
fi.desc: Cash vouchers update in set accounting period. Button "Services" enables print of current document, match document with invoice, debt or obligation.

fi.name: pokDenik
fi.desc: This will execute calculation and bank book print

fi.name: pokRady
fi.desc: Document series setting for Cash vouchers update.

fi.name: banBsp
fi.desc: List of bank accounts of the firm, including the definition of the method of electronic communication.

fi.name: pokBsp
fi.desc: Update of the cash desk list

fi.name: obchodNapDokl
fi.desc: You can create received supplies manually or by copying the issued demand. By copying demand to supply you save time and you must modify just prices specified by your supplier.

fi.name: obchodNapRady
fi.desc: Updates of number series for offers received.

fi.name: obchodNavDokl
fi.desc: List records all issued supplies, which were sent to your customers. It is possible to copy supply content to received order. Issued supply can be created by copying of received demand.

fi.name: obchodNavRady
fi.desc: Updates of number series for offers issued.

fi.name: obchodPppDokl
fi.desc: Received requisiitions list records all requisitions of your current or potential customers. It is possible to copy one's requisition's content to issued supply or directly to received order.

fi.name: obchodPppRady
fi.desc: Updates of number series for requisitions received.

fi.name: obchodPpvDokl
fi.desc: Issued requisitons can be created manually or by copying the received order. Here starts the reverse process (against sale), when you need to buy goods or material from your suppliers.

fi.name: obchodPpvRady
fi.desc: Updates of number series for requisitions issued.

fi.name: obchodObpDokl
fi.desc: Received orders serve for records of requirements of your customers. Agreed sale price is mentioned in order items. By pressing one button, you can create issued invoice.

fi.name: obchodObpRady
fi.desc: Updates of number series for orders received.

fi.name: obchodObvDokl
fi.desc: Issued orders are similar (in content) with received orders. Only the ordering direction is opposite and prices are purchasing. It is possible to create issued order on the basis of received order. It means, that you will require from your suppliers only what your customers require.

fi.name: obchodObvRady
fi.desc: Updates of number series for orders issued.

fi.name: uSestavy
fi.desc: Users reports seting and calculation. Function enables to you definition sever accounting report, setting accounts placement a value and activate calculation for range of months.

fi.name: cisZak
fi.desc: List of orders. Each document can contains link to order. You can analyze costs of concrete order with standard summaries.

fi.name: cisZakNehotov
fi.desc: Orders - not showing finished

fi.name: cisClenDph
fi.desc: VAT category dictates placement of document values in the VAT return. (Key F2)

fi.name: cisDphPren
fi.titl: List of goods with VAT transfer regime
fi.desc: Tax statement per §92a Law on VAT

fi.name: majUmisteni
fi.desc: Location of property pre-defined with 3 categories - building, section and room.

fi.name: majSazby
fi.desc: Groups of depreciation rates contain standard values defined by current legislation. You can insert your specific depreciation rates.

fi.name: majTypMaj
fi.desc: Property types enables the classfication of property into groups with advanced definition. Use of groups simplifies choice and delivers greater trnasparency.

fi.name: majTypLeas
fi.desc: Leasing property types enables the classfication of property into groups with advanced definition.

fi.name: majMajetek
fi.desc: Fixed assets, low-values fixed assets and not depreicable assets update. Depreicable assets card contain tax depreciations, account depreciation, events and registrations loans and responsible persons. You can stop depreciations anytime. You can modify depreications period during the property life.

fi.name: majBwithE
fi.desc: Updates of long-term, small and nondepreciative property.

fi.name: majLeasing
fi.desc: Leasing property update, definition schedule of payments and creating accounting costs. By generation schedule of payments are automatically created debts in accounting module.

fi.name: elPrikaz
fi.desc: Definition payment order from list of invoices in wit possibility his addition. Program support export payment order into most of banks electronical formats .

fi.name: elPrikazFak
fi.titl: Selection of documents to be paid

fi.name: elInkaso
fi.desc: Definition of inkaso instruction from list of issued invoices and receivables with possibility of modification. Application supports the export of instructions to most Czech banking instituitions.

fi.name: elInkasoFak
fi.titl: Selection of documents to be paid

fi.name: vykazSaldoKdatuWizard
fi.titl: Calculation of payment balance as at

fi.name: priznaniDanPo
fi.titl: Balance and Profit and Loss Statements in XML

fi.name: vykazPolozkyFakturZiskSkupinyCen
fi.titl: Analysis of sales - turnover of price groups

fi.name: vykazPolozkyFakturZboziOdberatele
fi.titl: Sales analysis - Sales to companies by goods

fi.name: vykazPolozkyFakturOdberatelZbozi
fi.titl: Sales analysis - Goods movements per company

fi.name: vykazPolozkyFakturWizard
fi.desc: Sale analysis will help you to provide following information: Turnover and business margin (income) by customers / groups of cust. / sold goods / groups of goods / centres etc. (entry is in roller list "What do you want to analyse"). You can also enter another more detailed classification (entry is in next list "What will be next classification") again by selected attributes. Result can be for example analysis of sale to individual companies with detailed classification of which goods which company has taken. You analyse everything in given time range.

fi.name: analyzaNakupuZiskOdberatele
fi.titl: Analysis of purchasing - Purchases from companies

fi.name: analyzaNakupuZiskSkupinyFirem
fi.titl: Analysis of purchasing - Purchases from groups of companies

fi.name: analyzaNakupuZiskSkupinyCen
fi.titl: Analysis of purchasing - Purchases from price groups

fi.name: analyzaNakupuZiskZbozi
fi.titl: Analysis of purchasing - Purchasing of goods

fi.name: analyzaNakupuZboziOdberatele
fi.titl: Analysis of purchasing - Purchasing from companies according to goods

fi.name: analyzaNakupuOdberatelZbozi
fi.titl: Analysis of purchasing - Purchasing of goods based on company

fi.name: analyzaNakupuWizard
fi.desc: Analysis of purchasing can provide you with the following information: Turnover by clients / groups of clients / sold goods / groups of goods / centres etc. (assignment is in drop-down list “What do you want to analyse?”) You can also enter additional more detailed categorization (entries in the next list “What will the further categorization be?”) again based on named attributes. The result could be, for example, analysis of purchasing from individual companies with detailed categorisation of which goods the company has supplied. You will analyse everything in the particular time range.

fi.name: nezVazbyPolSklad
fi.titl: FIFO links of issue cards disintegartion

fi.name: aktivaceProduktu
fi.titl: Guide for activation of ABRA Flexi application

fi.name: scanner
fi.titl: Entering of amount of EAN codes

fi.name: migraceS3
fi.titl: Migration of agenda from Money S3

fi.name: zalohyKOdpoctu
fi.desc: ###Seznam záloh, které je možné odpočítat od dané faktury. Pouze jako relace faktury.

fi.name: castkyKOdpoctu
fi.desc: ###Částky, které ještě zbývá ze zálohy odpočítat. Pouze jako relace faktury.

fi.name: doporuceni
fi.desc: ###Doporučení na úpravu faktury nebo zálohy, aby po odpočtu byla faktura uhrazená.
